description.@en: From ball gowns to theatrical dress and even military styles, I’ve made them all.

effect.@en: Record this Talent name by your Skill Ranks— Costuming. Whenever you use a Skill that could be paired with Costuming, ignore any penalties your character is currently suffering from due to your Peril Condition Track. You also gain a +10% Base Chance to use the Skill when paired.
